## ni aws env

Create a POSIX-compatible script that can be sourced to configure the AWS CLI

### Synopsis

Create a POSIX-compatible script that can be sourced to configure the AWS CLI

```
ni aws env
```

  -d, --directory string   configuration output directory
  -h, --help               help for env
